name: Wordsearch Attack
description:
WORDSEARCH ATTACK

Find the list of words hidden on the board.

Some features of the WORDSEARCH game:
  • Choose which list words are taken from.
  • Choose the minimum/maximum size of the words to find.
  • Words are hidden in random boards of letters (depending on the word list that you chose, the board may also contain numbers).
  • 3D boards.
    • Cube based boards, cylinder shaped boards, hexagonal boards, hexagonal prismatic cellulation (basalt column) boards.
    • Pre-shaped boards and boards you can set the dimensions on (up to 100x100x100 cuboids).
  • Find words horizontally, vertically, diagonally*, forwards, backwards, around corners...
  • Select the first tile of a word in the list, and then the last tile of that same word and it's marked off.
  • You can play against the clock or not have a clock and just take your time.
  • Progress saves when you exit, come back later to finish a board.
  • Finish the board by finding all the words in the list.

Notes
This game is a "cut down" version of the wordsearch game that is integrated into the Word Attack game suite. Additional to this game, the version in Word Attack can utilise the Voxel designer so you can create your own boards, as well as having workshop support (it also includes a number of other types of game). Don't buy this game if you already have the full Word Attack.

* Boards with hexagons do not place words "diagonally", words on hexagons are placed along the 3 primary axis of the hexagon.
